archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1182
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a user purchasing a service, at checkout with an unknown email address, I want to create a password, so I can create credentials for my self service account as part of checkout

properties.value: DS: Normally password is created by the customer later on when he receives an e-mail with confirmation of order and customer registration. Creation of a new customer or authentication is a part of a purchase process

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
